content.rendered:
Below you will find a list of important dates, school breaks, and Regents exam days for the 2023-2024 school year.

July 4: Independence Day

September 4: Labor Day

September 5-6: Superintendent’s Conference Days

September 7: Classes Begin

September 25: Yom Kippur

October 9: Columbus / Indigenous Peoples’ Day

November 7: Supt.’s Conference Day

November 10: Veterans Day Observed

November 22-24: Thanksgiving Recess

December 22-29: Holiday Recess

January 1: New Year’s Day

January 2: Classes Resume

January 15: Martin Luther King jr. Day

January 23-26: Regents Testing Days

February 19-23: Mid-Winter Recess

March 29: Good Friday

April 1-5: Spring Recess

May 24-27: Memorial Day Recess

June 4 and 14-26: Regents Testing Days (with June 17 and June 26 as designated rating days)

June 19: Juneteenth

June 26: Projected Last Day of School
